name: Mobile Missile Command
description:
Overview

Mobile Missile Command is a frantic tap-shooting action defence game deriving from the classic Missile Command from the age of Retro. The Player tries to hold out for as long as possible against the relentless assault of raining missiles to defend the Colony!

Features
  • Tens if not hundreds of missiles on-screen!
  • Controlled by Touch input 
  • 4 Unique enemy missiles 
  • Cinematic and explosive gameplay
MAGES Institute of Excellence

Mobile Missile Command was developed over a 6 week period by DGDT Student James Santiago as part of the Mobile Game Development Module.
